Content:: Notes: This article documents the timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in Turkey. The Ministry of Health set up the Coronavirus Scientific Advisory Board.[1] It consists of 26 members specialized in Chest Diseases, Infectious Diseases and Clinical Microbiology.[2] The number of board members increased later to 31 with the joining of expert academics in Virology, Internal medicine and Intensive care medicine.[1] The board works out guidelines for the treatment by medicals and measures to be followed by the public, and updates them in context of the disease's course in the country.[2][3]
